summary:
## Fixed the build error.

##  Startup Control & Performance Lab UX

###  Startup Backup & Restore
- Added **proactive backups** for Run/RunOnce entries so they can always be restored, even if deleted or renamed.
- UI and service now share the **same backup store**, preventing mismatched or missing restore sources.
- Added helpers that recover entries by **value name**, not just ID, improving restore reliability.
- Startup enable falls back to the backup store before failing - no more “No data to restore.”
- Toggle actions now **refresh commands, counters, and paging instantly**, so you can re-toggle without manual refresh.

###  Visibility & Messaging
- Logging now includes **action, entry name, source tag, user context, and registry/task path** for immediate clarity.
- Status chips now distinguish “detected” vs “in effect” - detects stay visible without falsely reporting success.

###  Guardrails & Automation
- Added **DisableAutomationCommand** to turn off boot automation + auto-tune monitoring in one click.
- Introduced “**arm tweaks**” guard and automation kill switch UI - apply buttons stay locked until armed.
- Boot automation “Run Now” and all tweak actions now require the guard lock to prevent accidental changes.
- All write/restore actions are **guard-locked**, with updated `CanExecute` logic for safe UI flow.

###  UI Touch-Up
- Improved side-bar.
